title: Is it illegal to burn a Bible? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Not in the UK. Obviously, you can do so in a dangerous way. And certain way you could do, such as on the steps of a church during a service, might be regarded as provocative behaviour. But there is no general prohibition o burning a Bible. Nor even, so far as I know, a customary way of disposing of one.
